panels.description: The data import process percentage of Dumpling. The value is an estimated value and may exceed less than 100%.
panels.title: dump progress

panels.description: The data import process percentage of Loader. The value range is 0% ~ 100%
panels.title: load progress

panels.description: The predicted remaining time it takes Syncer to be completely synchronized with the master (in seconds)
panels.title: remaining time to loader

panels.description: Dumper encounters an error within the DM-worker and exits
panels.title: dump process exits with error

panels.description: Loader encounters an error within the DM-worker and exits
panels.title: load process exits with error

panels.description: The time it takes loader to execute every statement to the downstream (in seconds)
panels.title: statement execution latency - 90

panels.description: number of sql executed per second
panels.title: transaction execution QPS

panels.description: The duration that Loader executes a transaction (in seconds)
panels.title: transaction execution latency

panels.description: The total number of tables in the full data imported by Loader
panels.title: table count

panels.description: The total number of data files in the full data imported by Loader (including the `INSERT INTO` statement)
panels.title: data file count

panels.description: The total size of the data files in the full data imported by Loader (including the `INSERT INTO` statement)
panels.title: data file size

panels.description: number of sql executed per second(one minute average value, dm_syncer_finished_jobs_total )
panels.title: Replication QPS

panels.description: The predicted remaining time it takes Syncer to be completely synchronized with the master (in seconds)
panels.title: Remaining time to sync

panels.description: The latency time it takes to replicate the binlog from master to Syncer (in seconds)
panels.title: Replication lag

panels.description:
number of sql executed per second(one minute average value, dm_syncer_finished_jobs_total )

The maximum TPS estimated according to the recent SQL time-consuming, may vary greatly with different SQL
panels.title: Replication QPS (Sum by task)

panels.description: The binlog replication unit process encounters an error within the DM-worker and exits
panels.title: process exits with error

panels.description: The number of add/finished jobs per unit of time
panels.title: DM SQL jobs

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to detect conflicts between DMLs (in seconds)
panels.title: DML conflict detect duration

panels.description: The number of binlog events received per unit of time (this number does not include the events that need to be skipped)
panels.title: binlog event QPS

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to add a job to the queue (in seconds)
panels.title: add job duration

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to execute the transaction to the downstream (in seconds)
panels.title: transaction/ddl query execution latency

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to execute every statement to the downstream (in seconds)
panels.title: statement execution latency - 90

panels.description: The number of binlog events received per unit of time that needs to be skipped
panels.title: skipped binlog event QPS

panels.description: The remain length of DML job queues
panels.title: DML queue remain length

panels.description: The size of a single binlog event that the binlog replication unit reads from relay log or upstream master
panels.title: binlog event size

panels.description: The number of binlog files in binlog replication unit that are behind the master
panels.title: binlog file gap between master and syncer

panels.description: The number of rows of each binlog event that enters the DM
panels.title: binlog event row number

panels.description: The duration that the binlog replication unit reads binlog event from the relay log or upstream MySQL (in seconds)
panels.title: read binlog event duration

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to parse and transform the binlog into SQL statements (in seconds)
panels.title: binlog event cost duration

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to dispatch a binlog event (in seconds)
panels.title: dispatch binlog event duration

panels.description: The number of unsynced tables in the subtask
panels.title: unsynced tables

panels.description: The number of binlog files in binlog replication unit that are behind relay
panels.title: binlog file gap between relay and syncer

panels.description: The time interval of DM written to disk
panels.title: Flushed Checkpoint Time Interval

panels.description: Is waiting shard DDL lock to be resolved, >0 means waiting
panels.title: shard lock resolving

panels.description: The time it takes binlog replication unit to skip a binlog event (in seconds)
panels.title: skip event duration

panels.description: Display the number of sql contained in the dm copy incremental data to the downstream transaction from each latitude
panels.title: replication transaction batch

panels.description: The storage capacity of the disk occupied by the relay log
panels.title: storage capacity

panels.description: The remaining storage capacity of the disk occupied by the relay log
panels.title: storage remain

panels.description: The relay log encounters an error within the DM-worker and exits
panels.title: process exits with error

panels.description: The number of corrupted relay log files
panels.title: relay log data corruption

panels.description: The number of errors encountered when the relay log reads the binlog from the upstream MySQL
panels.title: fail to read binlog from master

panels.description: The number of errors encountered when the relay log writes the binlog to disks
panels.title: fail to write relay log

panels.description: The largest index number of relay log files. E.g. "value = 1" indicates "mysql-bin.000001"
panels.title: binlog file index

panels.description: The number of binlog files in the relay log that are behind the upstream master
panels.title: binlog file gap between master and relay

panels.description: The write offset of the latest relay log file
panels.title: binlog pos

panels.description: The duration that the relay log reads binlog event from the upstream MySQL (in seconds)
panels.title: read binlog event duration

panels.description: The duration that the relay log writes binlog event into the disks each time (in seconds)
panels.title: write relay log duration

panels.description: The size of a single binlog event that the relay log writes into the disks
panels.title: binlog event size

panels.description: number of dm-masters try to start leader components per minute
panels.title: number of dm-masters start leader components per minute

panels.description: number of worker in different states, -1 - unrecognized, 0 - offline, 1 - free, 2 - bound
panels.title: number of workers in different state

panels.description: state of worker, -1 - unrecognized, 0 - offline, 1 - free, 2 - bound
panels.title: workers' state

panels.description: number of worker event error
panels.title: number of worker event error

panels.description: number of shard DDL lock/operation error in one minute
panels.title: shard ddl error per minute

panels.description: number of pending shard DDL in different states, Un-synced (waiting all upstream), Synced (all upstream finished, waiting all downstream)
panels.title: number of pending shard ddl

panels.description: The number of error happens before operate
panels.title: before any operate error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate source bound
panels.title: source bound error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate start
panels.title: start error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate pause
panels.title: pause error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate resume
panels.title: resume error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate auto-resume
panels.title: auto-resume error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate update
panels.title: update error

panels.description: The number of error happens in operate stop
panels.title: stop error

list.description: This parameter takes effect only in op deployment.
list.label: Worker
list.name: worker
